system.note: Targets that are hit, enter the smoke, or start their turn in the smoke they must make a -30 Willpower Test or reduce their Psy rating by 1 per Degree of Failiure. If failing by 2+ DoF must immediately roll Psychic Phenomena. Every 6 hours regain 1 Psy rating lost by this weapon. Attempts to manifest a power in this smoke auto-fail.
